## Read online table

### Download table (`*.csv`)

```{r}
#set variables
csv_url  <- "https://oceanview.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/cciea_AC.csv"
dir_data <- "data"

# derived variables
csv <- file.path(dir_data, basename(csv_url))

# create directory
dir.create(dir_data)

# download file
download.file(csv_url, csv)
```
